configurations.name: Launch API
configurations.command: docker rm --force totem-auth-service && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 --env-file "$(pwd)"/.env --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/package.json,target=/usr/totem/auth/package.json --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/usr/totem/auth/src --name totem-auth-service miguel-panuto/auth-totem
